branchCategory.name: PSE300AC, Pressure Sensor Monitor, 3 Screen, 2 Outputs, IP65
branchCategory.description: <p>PSE300AC is a remote sensor monitor with an informative, easy to read 3 screen 3 color display.  While primarily suited for the PSE570 pressure sensor series, its range input function scales the analog output of any sensor with M12 connector.  View the sensor's measured value on the main screen, while also viewing a variety of secondary data on the sub-screens.  Upgraded features include front facing M12 power and sensor connections, low energy consumption, and selectable NPN/PNP outputs.  PSE300AC is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p>

breadCrumb.name: PSE300AC, Pressure Sensor Monitor, 3 Screen, 2 Outputs, IP65
